languages.text: {n}В агрессивном голосе Соломона вы слышите затаенную надрывную нотку, а в глубине его взгляда — умело скрываемую панику.{/n}
{n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В агрессивном голосе Соломона вы слышите затаенную надрывную нотку, а в глубине его взгляда — умело скрываемую панику.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile voice, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}
{n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile voice, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}
{n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}
{n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}
{n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}
{n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

languages.text:
{n}ソロモーンの敵意に満ちた口調には、どこか張り詰めたものが感じられ、
その目の奥には、巧妙に隠された動揺がかすかに見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
{n}ソロモーンの敵意に満ちた口調には、どこか張り詰めたものが感じられ、
その目の奥には、巧妙に隠された動揺がかすかに見えた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du spürst eine gewisse Anspannung in Solomornes feindseligem Ton und eine wohlversteckte Panik tief in seinen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du spürst eine gewisse Anspannung in Solomornes feindseligem Ton und eine wohlversteckte Panik tief in seinen Augen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous percevez une certaine tension dans le ton hostile de Solomorne, tandis qu'un éclair de panique traverse son regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous percevez une certaine tension dans le ton hostile de Solomorne, tandis qu'un éclair de panique traverse son regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Detectas un deje de angustia en el tono hostil de Solomorne, y su expresión oculta hábilmente el pánico que siente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Detectas un deje de angustia en el tono hostil de Solomorne, y su expresión oculta hábilmente el pánico que siente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你从索罗蒙充满敌意的语气中感觉到了紧张，在他目光深处察觉到了层层掩饰的恐慌。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你从索罗蒙充满敌意的语气中感觉到了紧张，在他目光深处察觉到了层层掩饰的恐慌。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un saldırgan sesinde göze çarpan bir gerginlik, gözlerinin derinliklerindeyse gizli bir panik seziyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You detect a certain strain in Solomorne's hostile tone, and well concealed panic deep in his eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un saldırgan sesinde göze çarpan bir gerginlik ve gözlerinin derinliklerinde gizlenmiş bir panik seziyorsun.{/n}
